marker.ph:
<<controls:MetroWindow.RightWindowCommands> <controls:WindowCommands> <!--<TextBox Name="CustomColor" Text="{Binding CustomColorText, UpdateSourceTrigger=LostFocus}" Width="100" />--> <Button Command="{Binding AboutWindowClick.Command}" Name="AboutWindow"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Information" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="about" /> </StackPanel> </Button> <!--<Button Command="{Binding ToggleFlyout.Command}" Name="ToggleSettingsFlyout"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Settings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="settings" /> </StackPanel> </Button>--> </controls:WindowCommands> </controls:MetroWindow.RightWindowCommands> <Grid> <!-- Taskbar Icon --> <tb:TaskbarIcon Name="TestTaskbarIcon" ToolTip="Test" ToolTipText="Test" Visibility="Hidden" /> <Label Content="Input:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,10,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="23" Margin="100,10,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="txtInput" Text="{Binding InputText}" Background="{Binding InputBackground}" />
<Label Content="Output:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,41,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="23" Margin="100,41,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" VerticalAlignment="Top" IsReadOnly="True" Text="{Binding OutputText}" Background="{Binding OutputBackground}" />
<Button Content="{Binding EncryptClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="100,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnEncrypt" Command="{Binding EncryptClick.Command}" /> <Button Content="{Binding DecryptClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="185,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnDecrypt" Command="{Binding DecryptClick.Command}" /> <Button Content="{Binding CompareClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="270,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnCompare" Command="{Binding CompareClick.Command}" />
<Label Content="Encrypted:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,106,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="140" Margin="100,106,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" IsReadOnly="True" Name="txtEncrypted" Text="{Binding EncryptedText}" VerticalAlignment="Top" />
<Label Content="Network:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,251,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <ComboBox Height="23" Margin="100,251,10,0" IsReadOnly="False" Name="cboNetwork" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> </Grid> <controls:MetroWindow.Flyouts> <controls:FlyoutsControl> <!-- Settings Fly-out --> <controls:Flyout Width="250" AnimateOnPositionChange="True" AnimateOpacity="True" Header="Settings" Position="Right" Theme="Accent" IsOpen="{Binding SettingsFlyoutIsOpen}"> <StackPanel> <!-- Theme --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Accent --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Save Style --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <!-- Horizontal Line --> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Build / Linker Time --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </controls:Flyout> </controls:FlyoutsControl> </controls:MetroWindow.Flyouts>.../>

<<controls:WindowCommands> <!--<TextBox Name="CustomColor" Text="{Binding CustomColorText, UpdateSourceTrigger=LostFocus}" Width="100" />--> <Button Command="{Binding AboutWindowClick.Command}" Name="AboutWindow"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Information" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="about" /> </StackPanel> </Button> <!--<Button Command="{Binding ToggleFlyout.Command}" Name="ToggleSettingsFlyout"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Settings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="settings" /> </StackPanel> </Button>--> </controls:WindowCommands>.../>

<<Button Command="{Binding AboutWindowClick.Command}" Name="AboutWindow"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Information" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="about" /> </StackPanel> </Button>.../>

<<StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Information" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="about" /> </StackPanel>.../>

<<iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Information" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="about" />.../>

<<tb:TaskbarIcon Name="TestTaskbarIcon" ToolTip="Test" ToolTipText="Test" Visibility="Hidden" /> <Label Content="Input:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,10,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="23" Margin="100,10,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="txtInput" Text="{Binding InputText}" Background="{Binding InputBackground}" /> <Label Content="Output:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,41,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="23" Margin="100,41,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" VerticalAlignment="Top" IsReadOnly="True" Text="{Binding OutputText}" Background="{Binding OutputBackground}" /> <Button Content="{Binding EncryptClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="100,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnEncrypt" Command="{Binding EncryptClick.Command}" /> <Button Content="{Binding DecryptClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="185,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnDecrypt" Command="{Binding DecryptClick.Command}" /> <Button Content="{Binding CompareClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="270,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnCompare" Command="{Binding CompareClick.Command}" /> <Label Content="Encrypted:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,106,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="140" Margin="100,106,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" IsReadOnly="True" Name="txtEncrypted" Text="{Binding EncryptedText}" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <Label Content="Network:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,251,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <ComboBox Height="23" Margin="100,251,10,0" IsReadOnly="False" Name="cboNetwork" VerticalAlignment="Top" />.../>

<<controls:FlyoutsControl> <!-- Settings Fly-out --> <controls:Flyout Width="250" AnimateOnPositionChange="True" AnimateOpacity="True" Header="Settings" Position="Right" Theme="Accent" IsOpen="{Binding SettingsFlyoutIsOpen}"> <StackPanel> <!-- Theme --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Accent --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Save Style --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <!-- Horizontal Line --> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Build / Linker Time --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </controls:Flyout> </controls:FlyoutsControl>.../>

<<controls:Flyout Width="250" AnimateOnPositionChange="True" AnimateOpacity="True" Header="Settings" Position="Right" Theme="Accent" IsOpen="{Binding SettingsFlyoutIsOpen}"> <StackPanel> <!-- Theme --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Accent --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Save Style --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <!-- Horizontal Line --> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Build / Linker Time --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </controls:Flyout>.../>

<<StackPanel> <!-- Theme --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Accent --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Save Style --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <!-- Horizontal Line --> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Build / Linker Time --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel> </StackPanel>.../>

<<StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel>.../>

<<Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" />.../>

<<Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" />.../>

<<Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button>.../>

<<StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel>.../>

<<iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" />.../>
<<Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" />.../>

<<Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" />.../>

<<controls:MetroWindow.RightWindowCommands> <controls:WindowCommands> <!--<TextBox Name="CustomColor" Text="{Binding CustomColorText, UpdateSourceTrigger=LostFocus}" Width="100" />--> <Button Command="{Binding AboutWindowClick.Command}" Name="AboutWindow"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Information" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="about" /> </StackPanel> </Button> <!--<Button Command="{Binding ToggleFlyout.Command}" Name="ToggleSettingsFlyout"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="Settings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5 0 0 0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="settings" /> </StackPanel> </Button>--> </controls:WindowCommands> </controls:MetroWindow.RightWindowCommands> <Grid> <!-- Taskbar Icon --> <tb:TaskbarIcon Name="TestTaskbarIcon" ToolTip="Test" ToolTipText="Test" Visibility="Hidden" /> <Label Content="Input:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,10,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="23" Margin="100,10,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="txtInput" Text="{Binding InputText}" Background="{Binding InputBackground}" />
<Label Content="Output:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,41,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="23" Margin="100,41,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" VerticalAlignment="Top" IsReadOnly="True" Text="{Binding OutputText}" Background="{Binding OutputBackground}" />
<Button Content="{Binding EncryptClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="100,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnEncrypt" Command="{Binding EncryptClick.Command}" /> <Button Content="{Binding DecryptClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="185,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnDecrypt" Command="{Binding DecryptClick.Command}" /> <Button Content="{Binding CompareClick.Text}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="270,72,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="80" Name="btnCompare" Command="{Binding CompareClick.Command}" />
<Label Content="Encrypted:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,106,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <TextBox Height="140" Margin="100,106,10,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" IsReadOnly="True" Name="txtEncrypted" Text="{Binding EncryptedText}" VerticalAlignment="Top" />
<Label Content="Network:" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="10,251,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> <ComboBox Height="23" Margin="100,251,10,0" IsReadOnly="False" Name="cboNetwork" VerticalAlignment="Top" /> </Grid> <controls:MetroWindow.Flyouts> <controls:FlyoutsControl> <!-- Settings Fly-out --> <controls:Flyout Width="250" AnimateOnPositionChange="True" AnimateOpacity="True" Header="Settings" Position="Right" Theme="Accent" IsOpen="{Binding SettingsFlyoutIsOpen}"> <StackPanel> <!-- Theme --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Accent --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Save Style --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <!-- Horizontal Line --> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Build / Linker Time --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </controls:Flyout> </controls:FlyoutsControl> </controls:MetroWindow.Flyouts>.../>

<<controls:FlyoutsControl> <!-- Settings Fly-out --> <controls:Flyout Width="250" AnimateOnPositionChange="True" AnimateOpacity="True" Header="Settings" Position="Right" Theme="Accent" IsOpen="{Binding SettingsFlyoutIsOpen}"> <StackPanel> <!-- Theme --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Accent --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Build / Linker Time --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </controls:Flyout> </controls:FlyoutsControl>.../>

<<controls:Flyout Width="250" AnimateOnPositionChange="True" AnimateOpacity="True" Header="Settings" Position="Right" Theme="Accent" IsOpen="{Binding SettingsFlyoutIsOpen}"> <StackPanel> <!-- Theme --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Accent --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Save Style --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <!-- Horizontal Line --> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Build / Linker Time --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </controls:Flyout>.../>

<<StackPanel> <!-- Theme --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Accent --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Save Style --> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <!-- Horizontal Line --> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <!-- Build / Linker Time --> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel> </StackPanel>.../>

<<StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Margin="10,5,0,0" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Margin="15,10,15,0" Orientation="Vertical"> <Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" /> </StackPanel>.../>

<<Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Theme" /> <controls:ToggleSwitch Name="ThemeSwitch" Margin="10,1,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontSize="12" IsChecked="{Binding AppUsesDarkTheme, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding AppDoesNotUseSystemStyle, Mode=TwoWay}" OnSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OnLabel="Dark" OffSwitchBrush="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" OffLabel="Light" />.../>

<<Label Width="50" Margin="0,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Accent:" /> <ComboBox Name="Accent" Width="165" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" SelectedItem="{Binding StyleAccent}" ItemsSource="{Binding StyleAccents}" />.../>

<<Button Name="SaveStyle" Width="165" Margin="60,5,0,0" Command="{Binding SaveStyleSettings.Command}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel> </Button>.../>

<<StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" /> </StackPanel>.../>

<<iconPacks:PackIconMaterial Kind="ContentSaveSettings" Width="20" Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <TextBlock Margin="5,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="save style" />.../>
<<Separator Background="{DynamicResource AccentColorBrush}" />.../>

<<Label Width="50" Margin="10,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Build" /> <Label Width="310" Margin="5,5,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Name="LinkerTime" />.../>
